Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/83rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, Holland, 87th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, Holland, 87th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/83rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at LaSalle
ShortDescription: Blue Line Service Delayed at LaSalle due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line Service Delayed at LaSalle due to signal problems.

Shuttle buses have been requested  from LaSalle to Damen (O"Hare Branch) to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
